description:
Powerful 4x4 Winches in Coffs Harbour to Get You Out of Trouble

Sooner or later, everyone who enjoys a 4WD adventure becomes bogged down or stuck in a tricky situation. In fact, it happens to even the most experienced drivers. Consequently, having a good quality and reliable winch fitted comes with peace of mind and the knowledge that you’ll be able to keep moving. Moreover, having a 4x4 winch fitted means you get help out your fellow adventurers too. We stock the best winch and recovery brands available in Australia. These are Runva, Rhino, Drivetech and Outback Armour. Each of these brands offer outstanding reliability, performance, and good looks. [su_spoiler title="More"]

Buying a 4x4 Winch in Coffs Harbour?

Look out for these premium features:

- Tough heavy duty materials - wired and integrated wireless remote control - battery isolator switch with key - Internal braking system - Robust gearing - IP68 rated to ensure no dust and water ingress

Call into Our Showroom in Coffs Harbour

Come and see our range of 4x4 winches and recovery gear by Runva, Rhino, Drivetech and Outback Armour at our Showroom in Coffs Harbour. We carry the complete range for you to check out and discuss. We are sure you’ll be impressed with their quality. Lastly, because we have our own workshop, we can also fit them too.

Automax 4x4 Accessories and Services

As a comprehensive one-stop-shop for everything 4WD in Coffs Harbour, we offer the following services:

  1. 4x4 Accessories advice, supply and fitting
  2. 4x4 Bullbars from Rhino, AFN, Uneek, Rival by Drivetech, Rockarmour and More
  3. 4x4 Rear Bars & Tow Bars including sales and fitting
  4. 4x4 Sliders and Side steps, brands we stock are AFN, Rhino, Rockarmour
  5. 4x4 Lighting. We offer the best 4WD LED Lighting by Stedi Lights
  6. 4x4 Suspension by Outback Armour and Boss Air Suspension
  7. 4x4 Winches & Recovery Gear by Runva, Rhino, Drivetech & Outback Armour
  8. 4x4 Vehicle repair, servicing and upgrades in Coffs Harbour
Call into our Showroom or Contact us today for expert advice on our great range of 4x4 Winches in Coffs Harbour.

[/su_spoiler]
